channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump: U.S. military "shot out" drug boat off Venezuela
item.description: President Trump's militarized drug war claimed its first target Tuesday by launching what the Pentagon called a "precision strike against a drug vesse...

item.title: Exclusive: Disney will pay $10M to settle children's privacy lawsuit with FTC
item.description: The Walt Disney Company on Tuesday said it has agreed to pay $10 million to settle a children's privacy lawsuit with the Federal Trade Commission rela...

item.title: Google won't have to sell Chrome in antitrust win
item.description: Google won't be forced to spin off its popular Chrome browser but must share data with competitors, a federal judge ruled on Tuesday. Why it matters: ...

item.title: National Guard illegally performed law enforcement in LA, judge rules
item.description: The Trump administration illegally instructed the National Guard to perform law enforcement activities during anti-ICE protests in Los Angeles, a fede...

item.title: Why economists now fear tariff rollbacks
item.description: Six months ago, economists warned of severe macro consequences from President Trump's tariff agenda. Now the inverse is taking hold: fears about the f...

item.title: Ernst won’t seek reelection, giving Democrats opening in battle for Senate
item.description: Ernst, 55, was first elected to the Senate in 2014 and comfortably won reelection in 2020.

item.title: Bowser welcomes federal law enforcement presence indefinitely
item.description: Bowser issued an executive order Tuesday requiring local coordination with federal law enforcement “to the maximum extent allowable by law.” The order...

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Trump to move U.S. Space Command headquarters from Colorado to Alabama
item.description: The president’s Oval Office announcement marks the latest twist in a years-long partisan battle over the agency’s home.

item.title: Trump amps up rhetoric toward Chicago as Democrats prepare for showdown
item.description: The president has not detailed any plans for Chicago but has said it would be “probably next” after he sent the National Guard to D.C.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
